data.name: ACCIO
data.description:
Casts the Summoning Charm in the target direction and draws the first opponent towards you, damaging and Binding them. 
* If the enemy cannot be drawn to your side, then it will be drawn to the middle of the battlefield.

data.name: ACROMANTULA VENOM
data.description:
Throws a bottle of Acromantula Venom at the target area, dealing Damage over time and slowing all ground opponent units in range. 
* The poison deals damage every second, increasing by 10% each time.

data.name: AGUAMENTI
data.description: Continuously sprays a total of 10 jets of water in a straight line. The line of attack can be adjusted by moving while casting. Each time a jet of water hits the same enemy, the Damage it deals increases.

data.name: ATMOSPHERE CHARM
data.description:
Casts a Thunderstorm that damages a single random opponent within its range each time it strikes. 
* Applies a Heal Reduction effect to units hit.

data.name: AVADA KEDAVRA
data.description:
Casts Avada Kedavra, dealing Damage to the first enemy hit. 
* Each opponent unit defeated by the Curse increases its Damage by 25%.  
* After defeating 4 opponent units, the Curse instantly defeats the targets it hits.

data.name: AZKABAN
data.description:
Summons a mirage of Azkaban, which comprises an inner and outer ring. 
* Opponents in the inner circle are imprisoned with very limited ways of escaping. 
* The outer ring will contract and when it merges with the inner ring, all opponents in the ring will be heavily damaged. Non-student units below 20% Health will be instantly defeated. 
* Opponents defeated within the inner ring while the Azkaban mirage is active or when the inner and outer rings merge will deal extra AoE damage.

data.name: BEWITCHED SNOWBALL
data.description:
Summons a snowball that rolls forward and explodes upon hitting an enemy or after reaching its maximum Range, dealing AoE damage. Snowballs of ample size can hit flying units. 
* Damage increases with rolling distance. 
* A snowman will appear in the explosion's wake, continuously slowing nearby enemies in range.

data.name: BLUDGER
data.description:
Hits a Bludger towards a target location. It returns upon hitting an enemy, dealing Damage to all enemies along its path. 
* You can move to catch the Bludger and hit it again, up to 5 times. 
* On the last hit, the Bludger will deal more Damage and knock back all opponents in its path.

data.name: BROOMSTICK
data.description:
Mounts a Broomstick, removing all Slow and Bind effects. You will fly to the target location before returning again, Damaging all enemies along the way. 
* Deals full Damage to the first enemy and 45% Damage to subsequent enemies hit. 
* You become an Aerial Unit while riding the Broomstick and cannot play any Cards.

data.name: CARPE RETRACTUM
data.description:
Carpe Retractum will pull all friendly summons in range to the caster, applying a temporary shield in the process 
* Upon Use: Ruduces the MP cost of your next Flipendo by 2.

data.name: CONFRINGO
data.description:
Casts Confringo. After hitting an enemy, it will then bounce to another random enemy dealing AoE Damage. Confringo now takes shelds into Consideration for its targets, including shields from Protego Totalum and other effects on summon and deallists. 
* The spell can bounce repeatedly on targets with shields. 
* The spell deals 2.5x damage to shielded targets.

data.name: CONFUNDUS CHARM
data.description:
Targets a random opposing player when played, reversing their movement and casting directions for a set duration. The target also takes increased damage from the first spell they receive while under the effects of the Confundus Charm. 
* Confundus Charm targets suffer increased damage from the first attack they receive (basic attacks excluded), with the direction reversal effect lifting once they take damage. 
*Basic attacks will not deal increased damape nor lift the Confundus effect.

data.name: CRUCIO
data.description:
Crucio deals sustained damage and stuns the target. 
* Deals only 50% and does not stun when cast on a Player Unit. 
* During the Spell, each subsequent tick stacks Damage from the last tick with additional Damage equal to 100% of the initial Damage. 3 stacks max. 
* Targets already hit by Crucio will take 35% addional Damage for every extra time hit, 4 stacks max.

data.name: CRYSTAL BALL
data.description: Summons 3 Crystal Balls that enhance your next 3 Basic Attacks. Each Basic Atack launches a Crystal Ball, prioritising the closest opposing player and dealing damage based on your Basic Attack damage. Crystal Ball attacks are not limited by range.

data.name: EPISKEY
data.description:
Casts a Healing Spell that continuously Heals Ally Units. 
* The Spell can be interrupted by various Control effects other than Bind while casting. 
* 50% healing on student units.

data.name: ESSENCE OF DITTANY
data.description: Immediately recovers a large amount of Health for Ally Units within range, who will continue to receive Healing over time.

data.name: EXPECTO POTRONUM
data.description:
Casts the Patronus Charm and generates a long lasting barrier. Passing through the barrier will grant Ranged Attack and Healing Bonuses for all Ally Units. 
*The Patronus Barrier can enhance damage and healing. Effect range +25%. Projectile speed +40%. 
* Opponents hit by Enhanced Spells for the first time will receive additional damage, increasing as the level of your Expecto Patronum Card does. 
* Patronus Bonuses are stackable, but their effects will be further reduced as their numbers increase. 
* Dark Spells will not receive the bonus.

data.name: EXPELLIARMUS
data.description:
Disarms the first opponent hit, dealing full damage. Other opponents in range receive 75% damage when disarmed. Disarm duration is reduced by 40% on player characters. 
* Those disarmed cannot cast spells for some time.

data.name: EXPULSO
data.description: Casts Expulso, which knocks back all Enemy Units in Range and deals Damage afer 1.3 seconds.

data.name: FLIPENDO
data.description:
Launches nearby non player units (excluding specific and controlled units/companions) to a selected location, temporarily boosting damage done for friendly units. 
* Upon Use: Ruduces the MP cost of your next Carpe Retractum by 2.

data.name: GLACIUS
data.description:
Casts a penetrating Freezing Spell that hits up to 8 enemies, Damaging and Slowing them by 70%, and leaving a frozen area where they stood. Slow duration is 40% shorter on opponents. 
* After some time, the frozen areas will shatter, damaging and stunning all opponents within range. Stun duration is 40% shorter on student units.

data.name: GLACIUS MAXIMA
data.description:
Casts Glacius Maxima that deals Damage to all opponents in a straight line after 1.5s. 
* If a Companion or your future self is present, they will also cast Glacius Maxima in the same direction. 
* Freezes opponents hit by two or more Glacius Maxima tracks, but each track's damage is decreased by 6%，up to a maximum of 52%.

data.name: GUBRATHIAN FIRE
data.description:
Places a Lv.1 Gubraithian Fire that scorches all opposing units in range. 
* Friendly Gubraithian Fires will gravitate towards one another, merging to unleash devastating AoE damage and levelling up in the process. 
* The MP cost of Gubraithian Fire is reduced by 1 if a friendly Gubraithian Fire is currently in the arena. 
* The burn and merge damage intensify as Gubraithian Fire advances, reaching its peak at Lv.4.

data.name: HEADLESS HUNT
data.description:
The Headless Hunt charges forward upon use, damaging and marking opponents in its path. Afterwards, the leader of the Hunt will attack the opposing witch or wizard, damaging all marked units. 
* By using Summon Cards whilst the Headless Hunt is in your hand, you can add up to three extra Hunters. 
* The more Hunters in the arena, the more charge and mark damage they deal. 
* The Headless Hunt deals full damage to the first opponent hit during the charge. Subsequent opponents in their path receive 25% damage.

data.name: HOWLER
data.description:
Sends a Howler to target location, which arrives after 2 seconds. Damaging and influence Fear on all enemies within its Range. 
* Units under Fear take 45% more Damage.

data.name: INCARCEROUS
data.description: Casts Incarcerous. Binds all enemies to the centre of the target area and deals Damage.

data.name: INCENDIO
data.description:
Casts Incendio, Damaging all enemies in a target area multiple times. 
* The closer enemies are to the centre of the flame, the more Damage they take.

data.name: INFLATUS
data.description:
Casts Inflatus, Damaging nearby enemies and levitating them in mid-air. 
* The Duration of levitation is reduced by 40% on Wizardkind.

data.name: NEBULUS
data.description: Summons a thick blanket of fog to cover a target area. All Ally Units in the fog become Invisible and slowly regain Health. Invisbility is broken if an enemy enters the fog.

data.name: OBSCURUS
data.description:
Transforms you into an invincible Obscurus, launching 6 rapid Basic Attacks on random Enemy Units in the target area while briefly slowing them. Afer the attacks, the target zone explodes, dealing massive Damage to all Enemy Units inside and erasing the Obscurus status. You then return to your starting point. 
* If there are no opponent units in the target area, the area will be detonated and the attack will end. 
* When the Obscurus effect wears off, you are weakened and take 40% more damage for 5 seconds.

data.name: OPPUGNO
data.description: Summons 6 canaries that fly around you. When any enemies are nearby, the canaries will swoop at them and deal damage.

data.name: ORB OF WATER
data.description:
Casts Orb of Water, drawing in all opponents within Range and dealing Damage over time. At the end of casting, the Orb will explode, dealing massive Damage. 
* Opponents cannot move in the Orb, while enemies will be Stunned. 
* Orb of Water can be disrupted by Control Cards.

data.name: PORTKEY
data.description:
Summons a Porkey. Any Ally Unit that touches the Portkey will be teleported and gain a Shield. 
* Ally Units are teleported to random positions in the enemy's half, and Player units are teleported to random positions in their own half.

data.name: PRIOR INCANTATO
data.description:
When you havea Prior Incantato in your Hand, it will turn into the last Spell Card you played, but with +1  MP Cost. 
* The level of the copied Card will be the same as that of your Prior Incantato Card.

data.name: PROTEGO
data.description: Casts Protego, granting a Shield to protect all friendly units in range. The Shield will quickly weaken.

data.name: PTOTEGO DIABOLICA
data.description:
Casts a ring of fire around you, dealing damage to all enemy units that enter. 
* Player units and future selves within the fire ring will charge it up. The more units there are, the faster it charges, up to a   maximum of three charges. 
* After completing a charge, a Fire Dragon will spawn and race towards the furthest opponent unit, dealing damage to all opponents in its path. 
* Each charge spawns an extra Fire Dragon.

data.name: PROTEGO TOTALUM
data.description:
Casts a Shield at a target location to take Damage for Ally Units within its radius. 
* The Shield loses some durability every 2 seconds and is broken when it drops to 0. 
* The Shield itself is Immune to Control effects, and cannot be Healed, Shielded, or receive Bonuses.

data.name: SECTUMSEMPRA
data.description: Casts Sectumsempra in the target direction to lacerate enemies. The Cuts wil bounce between nearby enemies, Damaging them in the process.

data.name: SIDE-ALONG APPARITION
data.description:
A short time after casting, you and all nearby Ally Units teleport to the target location and recover some Health. 
* Replaces your next Movement Card with Apparition. Apparition Cards not used at the end of the effect will revert to regular Movement Cards.

data.name: STUPEFY
data.description:
Casts Stupefy dealing damage, and significantly knocks back the first opponent hit. 
* If the enemy knocked back by Stupefy hits another enemy, it will deal Damage and Stun them. AoE Damage will also be dealt at the area of collision. 
* AoE Damage and Range are affected by the size of the unit knocked back.

data.name: SWELLING SOLUTION
data.description: Breaks a bottle of Swelling Solution, forming a puddle on the ground. Ally Units within the puddle will increase in size, Movement Speed, and Attack Speed.

data.name: TEBO
data.description:
Summons a Tebo that charges forwards after channelling its energy, damaging and briefly stunning opponents hit along the way. 
* The longer the Tebo prepares to charge, the more Damage it does, up to 200% extra Damage. 
* At maximum energy, opponents will also be knocked back when hit. 
* The Tebo Charge deals full Damage to the first opponent hit, and 25% less Damage to any other opponent hit.

data.name: THE STANDARD BOOK OF SPELLS
data.description: When played, 4 Cards in your Hand and the first upcoming Card in your opponent's Deck will be replaced by random one use only Spell or Summon Cards that each cost 2 MP, no matter their original cost. Levels of the random Cards are afected by the level of your The Standard Book of Spells and the level of these Cards in your spell collection. The higher the latter two, the higher the level of your random cards.

data.name: THE TALES OF BEEDLE THE BARD
data.description:
Applies 1 stackable Death's Mark to a random opposing duellist (Time-Turner future self excluded). 
*Adds a Death card to the top of your draw pile if one isn't already present. Play the Death card and pay a price to perform an AoE attack at the opponent with the highest number of Death's Mark stacks in the arena. 
* Death is a 4-cost Derivative Card. The price paid to Death is a percentage of your current Health. 
* Death's Mark can stack up to 4 times. New marks will prioritize targets that haven't reached the maximum stack. 
* If multiple targets have the same highest stack count, Death will randomly select one to apply damage. 
* When damaging targets with 4 Death's Marks, Death triggers a brief freeze effect. During this freeze, all attacks, effects, and participants are suspended, except for the Death card, which remains active. 
* If a target is hit by Death's attack, its Death's Mark stack resets. If a player target with Death's Marks is defeated by other units, its mark stack remains when it is rescued.

data.name: THUNDERSTORM
data.description:
Summons a Thunderbird to call upon a thunderstorm that casts 15 bolts of lightning. 
* Each lightning bolt will hit a random opponent unit, and apply a Heal Reduction effect. 
* For each opponent that the lightning defeats, its Damage increases by 10% Stacks up to 5 times. 
* After defeating five opponent units, the remaining lightning bolts will strike all opponent units.

data.name: TIME TURNER
data.description:
The Time-Turner will create a Future You to fight alongside you. Future You inherits all your Bonuses, and will move with you.
* Future You will lose some Health with each Basic Attack.In Duelling Club, Future You deals 50% Basic Attack damage. In other types of battles, it deals 100% Basic Attack damage.

data.name: TRANSFIGURATION
data.description:
Casts the Transfiguration Spell. While shapeshifted, enemies take more Damage. The transformation effect ends after taking Damage. 
* When the Transfiguration Spell hits an enemy unit, it bounces up to three times between nearby enemy units. 
* When hit, non-player units will be transfigured, and cannot attack for 3.5 seconds. 
* When hit, player units will not be transfigured, instead, they will be slowed by 50% and effect duration is reduced by 40%. 
* Player Basic Attacks on Transfigured units neither deal additional damage nor remove the effect.

data.name: VENTUS
data.description:
Shoots forth a powerful gust in a straight line, knocking back enemies along its path and dealing Damage. 
* Deals 200% additional Damage to Shields.

data.name: WEASLEYS' WILDFIRE WHIZ-BANGS
data.description: Discharges Weasleys' Wildfire whiz-bangs, dealing Damage multiple times to all enemies within range.

data.name: ZOUWU
data.description:
Use the cat teaser to attract the Zouwu. The Zouwu will attack the location of the cat teaser. Move to reposition the teaser and direct the Zouwu's attacks. 
* After two attacks, the Zouwu will return to its summoner and launch one last attack, before leaving the arena. 
* Every time you hit with your attacks, damage done by your last hit will be increased by 15%, maxing out at 30%. 
* The first and second attacks of the Zouwu attack combo will yield a movement card when they hit an opposing player unit or compaion unit. The third attack will yield 1 MP when it hits an opposing player unit or companion unit.

data.name: ACCIO SNOWMAN
data.description:
Summons a snowman, who will roll towards you, leaving a snow path in its wake. Friendly units that enter the trail will quickly side to its starting point and receive a Shield. 
* The snow trail lasts for 13 seconds.

data.name: ACROMANTULA'S NEST
data.description:
Summons a Spider Nest. The nest will spawn a Venomous Spider at the cost of its Health to Attack enemies. 
* When the Venomous Spider is defeated, it will leave a pool of venom in its place and another Venomous Spider will immediately spawn from the nest. 
* The Spider Nest is Immune to Control effects.

data.name: ASHWINDER
data.description:
Summons an Ashwinder to assist you in Combat. While the Ashwinder is active, it will Summon a smaller Ashwinder whenever you cast a Spell or Summon. 
* Small Ashwinders will rush towards the target and deal AoE Damnge. This Damage can also hit Aerial Units.

data.name: BABY ANTIPODEAN OPALEYE
data.description: Summons a baby Antipodean Opaleye that breathes fire on opponent units, dealing AoE Damage.

data.name: BABY CHINESE FIREBALL
data.description:
Summons a baby Chinese Fireball that follows its summoner around. 
* Whenever you or your teammate damages an opponent, the baby Chinese Fireball will also menacingly cough out sparks at the same target, damaging all opponents in range and filling its charge bar by 1/5. This effect has a short cooldown. 
* Once there are 5 charges, the baby Chinese Fireball will take to the skies and perform a wide AoE fire attack at all opponents in range before leaving the arena.

data.name: BABY MANTICORES
data.description: Imitates the movement of a Manticore for 10s, during which your Movement Speed is enhanced and no Movement Cards are spent (Apparition and Hagrid's Motorbike excluded). Control effects can interrupt this process. However, if uninterrupted throughout the duration, you will Encourage allies, increasing their Movement Speed. A baby Manticore will be Summoned to battle alongide you every 2.5s whilst the Spell is active.

data.name: BLAST-ENDED SCREWT
data.description:
Summons a Blast Ended Skrewt that attacks random enemies every 8 seconds at the cost of its own Health. 
* When the Blast- Ended Skrewt is in your Hand, its MP Cost is reduced by 1 for each Movement Card used (0 minimum).

data.name: BOMBTASTIC BOMB BOX
data.description:
Summons a Bombtastic Bomb Box that creates bombs at the cost of its Health. Bombs will travel with Ally Units, increasing their Movement Speed. 
* The bombs will also directly go for opponents when they are in range. 
* When a bomb carrying Ally Unit Attacks, the bomb will fly towards the first enemy struck and detonate, dealing AoE Damage. 
* If an Ally Unit unit with a bomb is defeated, the bomb will explode on the spot. 
* Deals 50% more Damage if the explosion only hits one target.

data.name: CENTAUR
data.description: Summons a Centaur. Centaurs can shoot penetrating arrowrs that deal Damage to all enemies in a straight line.

data.name: CORNISH PIXIES
data.description: Summons 3 Cornish Pixies against your enemies.

data.name: DEATH EATER
data.description:
Unforgivable Curse cards in the same deck will enhance the Death Eater upon summoning. 
* When in a deck with Crucio, the Death Eater's basic attacks transform into relentless Crucio attacks. Each attack deals damage 4 times. 
* When included in a deck with Avada Kedavra, the Death Eater will immediately cast the spell upon being summoned. Any units defeated by the Death Eater's Avada Kedavra contribute to the player's defeat count. Additionally, the summoned Death Eater shares the player's Avada Kedavra card level and instant defeat effects.

data.name: ERUMPENT
data.description:
Summons an Erumpent that dashes towards the nearest enemy (prioritising opponents). On impact, it explodes, dealing AoE Damage to both enemies and itself, and Stuns for 1 second. 
* The explosion's AoE Damage also applies to the Erumpent. 
* Explosion Damage increases with dash time. If the Erumpent has not hit an enemy within 6 seconds, it will directly explode.

data.name: FIENDFYRE
data.description:
Summons Fiendfyre that shoots fire at opponents to deal Damage. While active, Fiendfyre increases in size and Attack whenever a unit is defeated. 
* Fiendfyre can attack 3 opponents at once after defeating 6 units.

data.name: FIRE CRAB
data.description:
Summons a Fire Crab. When an enemy enters the Fire Crab's Attack Range, it will breathe fire at them, causing AoE Damage until they are defeated or out of Range. 
* Left alone, the Fire Crab will not move. It withdraws into its shell and takes 58% less Damage when not Attacking.

data.name: FWOOPERS
data.description:
Summons 2 Fwoopers that shriek and circle random enemies, dealing Damage while applying Fear. 
* Fear does not affect players.

data.name: GIANT SQUID
data.description:
Summons the Giant Squid to aid you in combat. Damage or healing received by its tentacles will reflect on its body, which is immune to Control effects and takes 50% less damage. 
* While the Giant Squid is present, opposing duellists will trigger a new tentacle every 1.2 seconds if they move, receiving damage in the process. 
* Additionally, the Giant Squid will reveal a new tentacle that deals AoE damage to the area with the most opponents every 5 seconds. 
* Each tentacle may persist in the arena for up to 9 seconds, attacking once. Up to 6 tentacles can exist simulaneously.

data.name: GOLDEN SNITCH
data.description:
Summons a high-speed Golden Snitch that moves randomly about the battlefeld. Every time it moves, the Golden Snitch loses Health but provides 1 Movement Card and 1 MP. 
* When the Golden Snitch's Health falls below 50%, it can be caught by you or your teammates, which instantly grants 3 Movement Cards and 1 MP.

data.name: KELPIE
data.description:
Summons a Kelpie that pounces at the target location, causing AoE damage. It then returns and circles around you, while doing so, when you deal Damage to Enemy Units, the Kelpie will pounce on them, dealing AoE Damage. 
* Each time the Kelpie pounces and hits an opponent player or defeats an opponent unit, its damage increases by 12%6, up to a maximum of 36%. 
* After increasing its Damage 3 times, the Kelpie will return to your side after each pounce. If the Kelpie receives an Attack Speed Bonus from Echoes on other Cards, 40% of that Bonus is turned into a Bonus Attack.

data.name: MATAGOT
data.description:
Summons a swift-moving Matagot that splits in two when its Health drops to 50%. It can split up to 2 times. 
* If the Damage from a single attack exceeds its current Health, the Matagot will be defeated and will not split.

data.name: MEMORY VIAL
data.description:
Summons a Memory Vial to the arena when played, capturing your current Movement Card count and MP. If the vial remains intact for the designated duration, both your Movement Card count and MP will be fully restored to their recorded state. 
* Memory Vials of non-players will not affect the Movement Card count and MP of players. 
* Successfully used Memory Vials are not considered defeated.

data.name: MOONCALF
data.description:
Summons a dancing Mooncalf that circles its summoner, immobilising them from playing Cards, attacking, or moving. Opponents can damage and defeat the Mooncalf during this period. After the dance is complete, the Card and 2 other Summon Cards with the same MP cost will now Cost 1 less MP until the end of the battle. 
* The Mooncalf Card is removed from your Deck for the duel after 3 complted dances.

data.name: MURTLAP
data.description: Summons a Murtlap that scurries around, healing nearby alies at the cost of its own Health and sharing the damage of the first incoming attack against its summoner. The Murtlap will leave the arena after completing a set number of heals or when its Health is fully depleted.

data.name: NIFFLER
data.description: Summons a Niffler to dig for buried treasure, periodically locating gold coins at the cost of its own Health, each of which recovers 1 MP foryou.

data.name: NORWEGIAN RIDGEBACK EGG
data.description:
Summons a Norwegian Ridgeback egg. When the Egg reaches 100% Health, a Baby Norwegian Ridgeback will hatch, spewing fire at random enemies 3 times and dealing AoE Damage. 
* The Egg starts with only 40% of its Max Health and regenerates 3% of its Max Health every second. 
* If the Dragon Egg takes total Damage equal to 110% of its Max HP, it stops automatically regenerating Health.

data.name: OCCAMY
data.description: Summons a teapot, from which an Occamy will fy out and attack random enemies at the cost of its own Health, dealing AoE Damage.

data.name: PAWN
data.description:
Summons a Pawn. When the Pawn attacks, it taunts surrounding opponents. It leaves behind two stone blocks upon defeat. The stone blocks will eventally turn into a Queen piece or enhance an existing Queen piece. 
* The Queen's Basic Attack deals double AoE Damage. When enhanced, the Queen will draw in nearby opponent units.

data.name: PHOENIX
data.description:
Summons a Phoenix which will continuously Heal Ally Units within range at the cost of its own Health. 
* The Phoenix will leave a pile of ashes once its Health has been depleted, from which it will rise after a period of time. After three resurrections, the Phoenix will return to your Hand when its Health depleted again. 
* The Phoenix's Max Heath is reduced by 10% every time it is reborn.

data.name: PIERTOTUM LOCOMOTOR
data.description:
Summons 2 Stone Soldiers that immediately taunt enemies. 
* When taunting, Damage taken is reduced by 99%.

data.name: SCAMANDER'S SUITCASE
data.description:
Summons Scamander's Suitcase, which draws in all nearby friendly summons if their Health is below 34%. 
* The Suitcas's capacity grows in proportion to the Maximum Health of the units it draws in. It will also peridically increase its capacity at the expense of its Health. 
* When the Suitcase reaches max capacity or is defeated, a Hippogriff will be summoned to fight alongside you. Each Suitcase can only summon 1 Hippogriff. 
* The Hippogrif's attack deals AoE damage in an arc. Its Health, Attaek, Range, AoE Damage, and size will increase proportionally to the capacity of the Suitcase and the mumber of creatures it contains at the time of summoning (will not exceed attribute limits). 
* The Hippogrif gains an additional Shield that absorbs Damage equal to 57% of its Maximum Health if summoned when the suitcase is at 75% or higher capacity. While the Shield is active, the Hippogriff gains +30% Attack Speed and Immunity to Control Effects such as Stun, Slow, and Knockback.

data.name: SPIDERS
data.description: Summons 6 baby spiders aginst your opponents.

data.name: STACK OF MONSTER BOOK OF MONSTERS
data.description: Throws 3 copies of the Monster Book of Monsters. The books sprint forward, knocking back all opponents hit along the way, then begin attacking.

data.name: SWOOPING EVIL
data.description:
Summons a Swooping Evil that charges towards the target location. 
* The Swooping Evil will envelop the first non student unit spotted, carrying and releasing it at the target location before unleashing an even more powerful attack. 
* The Swooping Evil circles and attacks once it reaches its target area. 
* The Swooping Evil loses 25% Health every 2.4 seconds.

data.name: THREE-HEADED PUPPY
data.description:
Summons a Three headed Puppy that can deal 3 consecutive strikes to a single enemy in each of its Attacks. 
* When the Three Headed Puppy is in your Hand, its cost is decreased by 1 every time a Spell Card is used (0 minimum).

data.name: THE MONSTER BOOK OF MONSTERS
data.description: Throws a copy of the Monster Book of Monsters. The book will sprint towards a target location, knocking back all opponents hit along the way, then begin atacking.

data.name: THUNDERBIRD
data.description:
Summons a Thunderbird, which will peridically cast a ring of lightning around three random Ally Units at the Cost of its own Health. 
* When Ally Units gain a lightning ring. they also receive a shield equal to the Thunderbird's Attack. 
* The Thunderbird can ignite a lightning ring to deal AoE Damage.

data.name: TROLL
data.description: Summons a slow-moving Troll whose every third Attack deals 160% of its normal Damage.

data.name: UICORN
data.description:
Summons an injured Unicorn that gradually recovers Health. Once at full Health, it will immediately launch a powerful charge at the farthest enemy, damaging all enemies on its path. The Unicorn then attacks by charging. 
* The Unicorn starts with only 65% of its Health, and recovers Health every 5 seconds. 
* The Unicorn will stop regenerating Health if its total Damage taken excceds 110% of its Max Heath.

data.name: WEASLEY'S FIREWORK BOX
data.description:
Summons a box of Weasleys' Wildfire Whiz bangs, dealing AoE Damage to enemies in Range. 
* Each box contains 6 Whiz-bangs. 
* Depleted boxes will transform into a tracking cannon, dealing massive AoE Damage centring the closest enemy.

data.name: WHOMPING WILLOW
data.description:
Summons a Whomping Willow. When there are enemy units in front of it, the Whomping Willow will hit that area, causing AoE Damage and knocking then back. 
* When summoned, the Whomping Willow will periodically hit random opponents with its branches and pull those that it touches towards itself. 
* The Whomping Willow cannot move.

data.name: WINGED CATAPULT
data.description:
Summons a Winged Catapult that attacks 5 times in the direction of its summoner at the cost of its own Health. Deals Damage to the first opponent it hits. 
* If any of the Winged Catapult's attacks hit a target, all subsequent attacks will lock on to the hit unit. 
* If the Winged Catapult hits an opponent, it restores 1 Movement Card.

data.name: YETI
data.description:
Summons a Yeti that deals AoE damage upon spawning. Over time, the Yeti's Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and Damage Resistance increase, while its Attack reduces until it reaches its minimum.
Ifa Yeti's first defeat happens before reaching minimum Attack, it will respawn momentarily with reduced Health, minimum Attack, and maximized speed and resistance.

data.name: ABIGAIL GREY
data.description:
Summons Abigail to fght alongside you. Placing Abigail close spawns her in Witch Form, while placing her farther away spawns her in Werewolf Form: 
* In Witch Form, Abigail performs basic attacks with her wand and periodically casts Incarcerous at the same level as her Companion Card to bind opponents. 
* In Melee Form, Abigail spawns next to the player before moving towards her target. When close enough, she pounces at the target location, dealing AoE damage and marking a nearby unit. Marked units temporarily take additional damage. She then performs 4 swiping attacks in a cone-shaped area to damage all opponents in front of her before commencing melee basic attacks.

data.name: ALBUS DUMBLEDORE THROWBACK
data.description:
Summons Albus Dumbledore, who increases friendly players' spells cast within a set range surrounding him, and marks all cards except: Unforgivable Curses, the Death Eater summon card, Dark cards, and their derivative cards. 
* When marked Cards are drawn 2nd used again, they earn the following benefits: Spell Cards are cast 1 more time but do less Damage. Summons revive 1 time after being defeated, but with reduced Health. 
* Spell and Summon CaNs that are enhanced share the same Card Level as Albus Dumbledore. 
* Each time he takes Damage, Dumbledore will apparate to random location. 15 seconds after being summoned, Dumbledore will leave of his own accord.

data.name: CASSANDRA VOLE
data.description: Summons Cassandra, who will cast a thundercloud around herself. The thundercloud will attack a single random enemy within Range, dealing Damage and knocking them back.

data.name: DANIEL PAGE
data.description: Summons Daniel, who restores Health to nearby Ally Units upon entering the battlefield. He then continues to Heal Ally Units at the cost of his Health.

data.name: FERY TWINS
data.description: Summons both Fischer Frey and Colby Frey to aid you.

data.name: GRAWP
data.description: Summons Grawp. Grawp will charge at random enemies and deal massive Damage. After colliding, Grawp will fall to the ground, take some time to get up and charge again.

data.name: HARRY POTTER THROWBACK
data.description:
Every time you use two Cards, Harry Potter (Throwback) will apparate and launch an attack. The power of the attack scales with the MP cost difference between the two cards previously used: 
- 0 or 1 MP Difference: Harry attacks the closest opposing duellist. 
- 2 or 3 MP Difference: Harry's attack explodes, dealing extra damage and slowing opponents in range. 
-4 or 4+ MP Difference: Harry's attack will deal extra damage equal to 10% of the opposing duellist's Health lost.

data.name: HARRY POTTER
data.description:
Summons Harry Potter. Harry will cast Expecto Patronum and continuously knock back opponent units within range at the cost of his Health. 
* Once per summon, Harry will protect you from any damage that would otherwise defeat you, granting a brief invincibility effect, after which he will retreat from the arena and regenerate a fixed amount of Health.

data.name: HERMIONE GRANGER THROWBACK
data.description: When you summon Young Hermione, the MP Cost of all Cards in your Hand is reduced by 1. Their MP Cost will return to normal after they have been used. Young Hermione will also use Learning Effortr to learn a Spell from your opponent, add it to your Deck as a Derivative Card, and reduce its MP Cost by 3. The Spell Level will be the same as that of the Young Hermione Card. Every time Hermione learns, she expends more 'Learning Effort'. The learning process is accelerated when opponents use Spell Cards.

data.name: HERMIONE GRANGER
data.description:
Summons Hermione. With every Spell Card you use, Hermione will cast the same, the Level of which is the same as Hermione's Level. 
* This effect hasa 10 second Cooldown. 
* Hermione will not cast Prior Incantato or Legilimency.

data.name: IVY WARRINGTON
data.description: Summons Ivy, who will immediately cast the Vanishing Spell, defeating the first opponent she hits. The Vanishing Spell cannot defeat Witches, Wizards, or certain Boss Units, instead, it deals moderate Damage.

data.name: KEVIN FARRELL
data.description: Summons Kevin, who will keep track of your Basic Attacks. After 24 Attacks or when Kevin is defeated, he will increase your Attack Damage based on the number of Attacks you' ve made.

data.name: LOTTIE TURNER
data.description: Summons Lottie, who will immediately replenish 1 MP for you. Lottie then replenishes 1 MP every 3 seconds at the cost of her Health.

data.name: LUNA LOVEGOOD
data.description:
Summons Luna Lovegood. When you use a Spell Card, Luna will cast a random Summon that costs 1 MP less than the Spell Card played. The Summon shares the same Card Level as Luna. 
After spending 14 MP on Spell Cards, Luna will call forth a Thestral to charge at the target location, dealing AoE Damage before striking 6 times in quick succession. If 5 or more strikes successully hit your opponents, or if the Thestral defeats an opponent while charging, it will split into 2 and charge at the closest opponent, each dealing 50% of the original Damage.

data.name: MALFOY GANG
data.description:
Summons Draco Malfoy, George Goyle, and Vincent Crabbe. 
* The gang of three shares a Health pool. When one is attacked, all three will take damage.

data.name: MINERVA MCGONAGALL
data.description:
Protessor McGonagall casts the Transfiguration Spell on all enemy units when summoned. 
* After that, for each subsequent Card played, Professor McGonagall casts Transfiguration on a random eneny unit. 
* When Professor McGonagall is in play, she will summon a Stone Soldier for every 8 Cards you use. 
* Professor McGonagall's Transfiguration Spell will not bounce between enemies.

data.name: ROBIN THISTLETHWAITE
data.description: Summons Robyn, who will immediately hit a Bludger to a target location, dealing AoE Damage and marking the enemies hit. Robyn then sends a powerful Bludger at every marked enemy. Robyn will then continue to hit the Bludger to deal AoE Damage.

data.name: RON WEASLEY THROWBACK
data.description:
Summons Ron Weasley. 
* Ron charges at all opponents upon being summoned, turning opposing units into chess pieces which he drags behind his horse. 
* After hitting all opponents along the way, Ron rams at a random opponent or the last opponent standing. 
* Charge Damage is reduced by 10% for each enemy hit, up to a maximum of 60%. 
* For every 6 enemies defeated, Ron summons a Wizard Chess piece - the King.

data.name: RUBEUS HAGRID
data.description:
Hop on Hagrid's Motorbike, increasing your Movement Speed and allowing you to crash into enemies along your path and deal Damage. 
* Damage dealt to you will be taken by Hagrid's Motorbike first if possible. The Motorbike is Immune to Control effects, but cannot be Healed or Shielded. 
* +2 Movement Cards when you ride on the motorbike.
